title: Can we address creep blocking? Even other creeps are complaining.
body:
No, literally.

Creeps themselves are taking **completely different paths** because they can't make a path around the physical *wall* of **other creeps.** 

Skip ahead to 1:40 in this video. Yes, it's funny and entertaining (I've watched it several times and LOL'd hard), but I've seen this happen in a couple games. And it's a tad annoying when you can't even depend on minions to do their job.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dlASnHilb0c

I honestly don't know what an ideal solution is, but I was curious if Riot knew how bad creep blocking has become since the new Rift was released. If so, could we get an update as to what (if any) plans are to go about remedying this?

Thanks! :D

I say noob yasuos, but i wont lie, when i see 4 enemies with under 20% health i cue the anime intro music.

*My mind is telling me noooooo*
What's your theory on Vayne then?
"If i keep tumbling i can dodge auto attacks like in the matrix" -Vayne Player
They try to 1v5 the other team when they get a Doran's blade and health pot.
I meant "Why" they do that.
and Riven. Can't forget Riven.
she's the supposed overpowered antagonist for the samurai anime yasuo's in

> [{quoted}](name=Talamare,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0JxWvL4b,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-27T17:49:13.973+0000)
>
> 1vs5?
> 
> I think you mean...
> 
> Pentakill?

Well the minions certainly didn't pentakill the other minions.
{{item:3060}} I beg to differ.

As someone who enjoys playing 6 stack {{champion:31}} , i can honestly say that creep block has made me consider buying a PD as my 6th item just so i can walk down a lane and into combat. it's ridiculous. i am a monster of the void! they move for me! I'll kick the suckers, not path infinitely between them
Ooo. Cho buff, if Cho'Gath has max stacks of Feast, he ignores unit collision, or knocks minions out of his way.
That would be so amazing. non-cho players would hardly notice, but cho players everywhere would rejoice.

LOL imagine if cho knocked minions out of his way. Lets say there are 3 inhibs down for your team and your whole base is flooded with mininos and u buy homegaurds and run around the base sending minions flying LMAO
The mental image its so funny but it wouldnt work cos combat :D

Knocks them out of the way omg pls.
Gtfo out of the way Godzilla needs to walk here
Or squishes non-cannon minions. Because if a max stacks Cho'Gath stepped on me, I'd probably be squished to death too.

Here's a good solution: remove it entirely, at least for friendly creeps. There has literally never been a time when someone dying or losing cs because his or her character glitches out on their own minion wave has ever added something to the game.
I actually did die as Janna after using my W on an enemy just to have their jungle Rengar kill me because I couldn't get away due to my creeps.

The worst part is adc's can use PD to just walk right through them, usually tanks are too tanky for it to really matter too much and junglers usually have a gap closer or health regen for it to matter, AD Bruisers usually also have a gap closer or anyone can basically build Phantom Dancer with one real exception: Mages, mages can build Phantom Dancer, but it adds uselessness to their abilities and takes up a slot just so we can walk through minions? There is literally no AP items for us to actually do this, the only way to do it is if we play Fizz, or another champion that can walk through minions like Alistar.. or we play someone like LeBlanc who can hop over them again..

I can beat that.  I got completely TRAPPED by creeps as Janna after using my W.  I sat there motionless for ten seconds, unable to go anywhere before the enemy cait realized she could just auto me to death and there was nothing I could do.  Right after I die, a creep walks away to attack something else...
But... but.. they just tried to gank! D:

Easy solution, remove.

Seriously though, it's such a random mechanic and feels random. It's not fun to have happen to you and it feels dumb when you get a kill because of it. Champion blocking could be left in the game, but creep blocking is completely unnecessary to the gameplay.

Minions have been acting odd for a while. I've noticed, on blue side, bottom lane, the first wave of minions will often go around the outer turret instead of their normal line. I've seen it happen in other lanes too, but with blue side bottom, it's pretty consistent and happens in every bot game.
I have seen this as well...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HvJYzQkO6W4

Yeah... this happens and sucks ass. Creep blocking has been an issue for way too long.

I had the exact same thing happen to me a few games ago.  I was Nautilus and I dove an enemy, my ADC killed them, I got creep-blocked, and died under the tower.  Luckily I only got executed, but it was still really annoying.
hahaha wow. such bull. I feel like creep blocking has become pretty bad even for champions trying to walk through their own minions

Creep blocking has numerous times determined the outcome of a gank, dive, or hard engage in matches I've played. It gets especially obnoxious lategame when there's 3 lanes of them duking it out around the Nexus.

Anyone ever seen them walk around bot turret?

I have.

no literally can we address your inability to actually click around to you know move? RAWR i try to click and let my guy auto walk through a wall of creeps  OP OP riot fix broken creep block! Heaven forbid any amount of skill make its way into the game.
The clicking around isn't the issue. The issue is the creeps literally box you in, so your champ just spazzes in a small circle til the scrum ends or he/she dies.

Blocking can be useful though. As an Anivia player it's always a way to land my Q, because my opponents blocked their own escape off...
Other champions can probably profit similarly... It makes positioning in or around minionwaves detrimental for landing or dodging skillshots, especially during laning phase.

Though it is kind of sad that there is only one item in the game which gives you the ability to pass through units... {{item:3046}} 
And that item is almost only usable by ADC...

> [{quoted}](name=Champion Skin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0JxWvL4b,comment-id=00190000,timestamp=2015-03-28T20:27:08.883+0000)
>
> Though it is kind of sad that there is only one item in the game which gives you the ability to pass through units... {{item:3046}}

Yes they could probably give PD passive to other items as well...

relevant

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4W8mMY24Bew
had a game last night where i got ganked by a canon minion while doing raptor camp...

I tried playing Singed. Enemies can literally walk around minions in circles while kiting me now :(
I honestly don't know how Riot messed the new minions up so much. It's the one thing in this game that I can't stand. Hopefully Riot fixes it soon, but I'm pretty sure it's intentional.

Ninja {{champion:120}} nerf?! D:  Oh well, for every non-{{champion:120}}  champ I play I feel the pain. Especially when you dive turret and your caster minions form a perfect wall to {{champion:268}}-block you.
{{champion:50}}: I see that rito allowed my troops in Summoner's rift.

The pathing has been garbage this season.. Creeps are so tiny, mid-big champs should be able to walk right over the top of em. Tiny champs should have to go around since they are closer to the same size.
Lol thats weird never seen it happen in game do

the song made it xd

another weird creep thing...ive had a minion chase me from top lane all the way to mid

Glad someone brought this up here. It's got so bad that seen often even the bots get stuck as well other players. Though its pretty dumb they can block flash to when you can use it to go through walls! wut...

I like how this is a post about the creeps taking a weird path instead of right before then the Wukong getting knocked back like half way across the map

Edit: just look about 15 sec before the 1:40 mark
